name: quick-claw
effect: Held in battle : Whenever the holder attempts to use a move, it has a 3/16 chance to act first among moves with the same priority. If multiple Pok√©mon have this effect at the same time, Speed is the tie-breaker as normal, but the effect of trick room is ignored.
short_effect: Held: Holder has a 3/16 (18.75%) chance to move first.
